suggestions.title: Add tags for solutions
suggestions.description: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

suggestions.title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
suggestions.description: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

suggestions.title: Add image/video upload to feedback
suggestions.description: Images and screencasts can enhance comments on solutions.

suggestions.title: Ability to follow others
suggestions.description: Stay updated on comments and solutions other people post.

suggestions.title: Preview images not loading
suggestions.description: Challenge preview images are missing when you apply a filter.

suggestions.title: More comprehensive reports
suggestions.description: It would be great to see a more detailed breakdown of solutions.

suggestions.title: Learning paths
suggestions.description: Sequenced projects for different goals to help people improve.

suggestions.title: One-click portfolio generation
suggestions.description: Add ability to create professional looking portfolio from profile.

suggestions.title: Bookmark challenges
suggestions.description: Be able to bookmark challenges to take later on.

suggestions.title: Animated solution screenshots
suggestions.description: Screenshots of solutions with animations donâ€™t display correctly.

suggestions.title: Add micro-interactions
suggestions.description: Small animations at specific points can add delight.
